version_note:
Dear Gigantix Wallet Users,

We are thrilled to share that a new version of the Gigantix Wallet app is now available, addressing your feedback and making significant improvements to enhance your digital wallet experience!

What's New in Version 2.0.4

  1. Bug-Free Transaction Experience:We've diligently resolved the bug affecting transaction sending, ensuring a smooth and error-free experience for all users.

  2. Enhanced Asset Management:Say goodbye to token selection issues! The "Manage Asset" section has been fine-tuned to guarantee seamless navigation and asset management.

  3. Accurate Token Details:The network view name on the token detail page has been corrected, providing you with precise and reliable information about your assets.

  4. Polished Alerts:We've rectified typos in alerts that may appear before creating a wallet, ensuring a polished and professional onboarding process.

  5. Date Inclusion in Notifications:Stay informed with more context! Notifications now include the date, allowing you to easily track and manage your financial activities.

  6. Interactive Trading View Charts:Elevate your trading experience! We've added Trading View charts for some tokens, empowering you with comprehensive insights into token performance.

How to Update:Updating to the latest version is a breeze! Head to your device's app store, locate the Gigantix Wallet app, and simply tap on 'Update.' For those with automatic updates enabled, you'll seamlessly receive the latest features.

"Please use the reset settings feature to correct some errors in the token configuration"

We appreciate your ongoing support and hope these enhancements contribute to a more seamless and enjoyable Gigantix Wallet experience. Should you have any questions or feedback, our dedicated support team is here to assist.

Thank you for choosing Gigantix Wallet!

Best regards,

The Gigantix Team üåê
